mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fi_customerinvoice( id, order_id, order_no, customer_id, service_charge, express_charge, travel_charge, material_charge, other_charge, service_times, payment_type, invoice_date, create_by, create_date, remarks, quarter ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{customer.id}, #{serviceCharge}, #{expressCharge}, #{travelCharge}, #{materialCharge}, #{otherCharge}, #{serviceTimes}, #{paymentType}, #{invoiceDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{quarter} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, order_no, customer_id as 'customer.id', service_charge, express_charge, travel_charge, material_charge, other_charge, service_times, payment_type, status, invoice_date, create_by, create_date, remarks, quarter FROM fi_customerinvoice WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flag = 0
